title: 04x5: 18 U.S.C. § 208 Recusal Obligations and Screening Arrangements
summary:
Recusals are required when an employee (1) is prohibited from participating personally and substantially in a matter by 18 U.S.C. § 208; (2) chooses or is directed not to participate in a matter involving specific parties under 5 C.F.R. § 2635.502; or (3) receives an extraordinary payment from a former employer under 5 C.F.R. § 2635.503.  

Notes: [Notes: (1) The guidance in this Advisory was updated in 2014 by Legal Advisory LA-14-06. (2) Among other changes to the Standards of Conduct effective August 15, 2024, a payment covered by 2635.503 is now referred to as a “covered payment,” not an “extraordinary payment.” See 89 FR 43686 and LA-24-06.]
